# Elite Dangerous Inara Overlay - Distribution

This directory contains release artifacts.

## Typical Contents

- `ED_Inara_Overlay_Setup_<version>.exe` - Windows installer
- optional checksums / release notes

## Install

1. Run the installer executable.
2. Follow the setup wizard.
3. Launch "Elite Dangerous Inara Overlay" from Start Menu.

## Runtime Requirements

- Windows 10 (1607+) or Windows 11
- .NET 8 Desktop Runtime (installer checks this automatically)
